replies.msg: Standard Chartered Hong Kong has stopped accepting buy order for RUSAL (Stock Code: 486.HK) for compliance reasons. Sell orders are not impacted. We will continue to monitor the situation and adjust the arrangement accordingly. In addition to Online Securities Trading, starting from mid-April 2018, the Bank will also implement the two factors authentication by sending one-time password to your mobile when you log into SC Equities. Please keep your mobile number record up to date with the Bank through branches. Details: sc.com/hk/2FA/EN EN: 28868868
